summary: Adds wizard race called alderiens, they start with 25 extra magicka and for skills they have +10 to alteration and +5 to illusion, destruction, resteration, conjuration and speech. Their passive ability makes them regen magicka 25% faster and their power increases their health, absorbs 20% of incoming spells and paralyzes people near them.
descriptionHtml: Adds wizard race called alderiens, they start with 25 extra magicka and for skills they have +10 to alteration and +5 to illusion, destruction, resteration, conjuration and speech. Their passive ability makes them regen magicka 25% faster and their power increases their health, absorbs 20% of incoming spells and paralyzes people near them.
author: Helqer
